divs: Sighting DetailsI was laying in bed looking out to the northwest sky and noticed a bright object in the sky. It was glowing and then going completely dark. It moved up and down and sideways. I looked at it through my binoculars and saw that it changed shapes, appearing sparkly like diamonds with different colored lightning bolts running through it. At one point it looked like a plate on it's side when it was moving sideways. I have previously seen similar type objects in the same direction of the sky. It is always on clear, cold nights.
Summary: An object in the northwest sky appeared brightly and then going dark and bright again. I viewed it with a binocular as it changed shapes moving up and down and sideways. It appeared like diamonds with lightning bolts running through it.
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There was one other sighting in San Antonio on or around December 1st 2010
